topic.title: Kiwipedia Support
topic.body: You added support for ZeroWiki. However, I think that Kiwipedia, by @gitcenter, is much better to use than ZeroWiki. One of the problems I had with it though, when trying to create a search for it, was that searching it is very slow (I'm still not quite sure why though).

1537267498_12gAes6NzDS9E2q6Q1UXrpUdbPS6n.body:
> [blurhy](#comment_4_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUtTpcK): Kiwipedia's db schema is mush different to ZeroWiki then caused error and the function doesn't invoke the callback.So you think it's very slow,but it will never be done.

I've implemented a search for Kiwipedia that works on Important Zites. So, if you are saying it's impossible, then it's not. If you are saying you won't do it because it's slow, then that's exactly why I mentioned how slow it is.
